Lord, I am turbulent and sometimes feel like I have a grasp on things but that is so rare and far between. I read Eph 3 this am and while it was encouraging, it didn't give me any physical boost, but it did give me an emotional one. It's almost like the bible / scripture is used to take our minds off so many of our issues and focus on the big picture that God is indeed in control and our worries are but momentary. I love to think that all these Dark times are producing a far greater worth in glory and I hate to sin and miss out on what the Lord is doing. In fact, maybe this is the chance I've been thinking about for the last 20 years. Lord, let me please be humble enough to hear your voice. put to death my pride, arrogance, sin, selfishness, and all the things that prevent my knees from bending to my King, Master, Father, Friend, Savior

there's too much going on for me to be drinking and smoking. things like; - my wife left me - my job is turbulent - my job is hard - I need to pack up and move - I am sad - I am want to hear from the Lord. - I want to end well - I need to learn to code by staying up and on longer AND stop with all the extra distractions (no more need to read zero hedge b/c you know it's coming. and know more need to listen to SGT b/c you don't have any more money, and no need to keep checking facebook all the time. it's not going anywhere.) if you must, write the status in here, backpack and post when you refind it if it's so great.

I want to end well, Lord. I want to know You above all else. I want to put aside news of war. Let's discuss this idea; What if mankind is in fact separated from God. So God reaches out past the stars and the invisible realm to reconnect with man. Now that I am reconnected with God, through the blood of Jesus, I am part of the kindom of Heaven once again and for all of eternity. If this is try, what now is the remainder of my time on earth to comprise of? While survival has captured my attention I can see how it has worn down my friends and family. Is it time to stop thinking, learning, searching for reality? Should I focus on just surviving at the most basic of levels? Or does that too get me into trouble? It seems to me that life is like Dudes in Igloos. While voluntary and exciting, it is still rigorous, tiring, and unknown. Is my life of the same way that I need to recognize that even though my life is cared for by the Lord, this will is still rigorous, tiring, and unknown. I conclude that what I do cannot be known until the Lord returns or calls me home.

I deposited rent today and this serves as a 30 day notice that we will be out by Friday, April 1st.

3rd party website that addresses the issue of buying apparel online. * This service stores your personal measurements (that you received from your tailor) and matches them with the item you're considering purchasing online. * When you click the 'match' button, the retail site will respond with either 'we recomend ___ size", or "this would not be your favorite fit, may we recommend one of these other items that would fit nicely" * in addition, you can chose to save these items to your 'virtual closet' where you can drag your items around to create virtual outfits. If you find that you're missing a piece of something, you can click to go back to the site that you origionally purchased something. This may actually drive customers to prefer the online method since they can keep a proper 'database' of their clothes. If they know it's online in their virtual closet, they may be more prone to wear items. Of course they can upload images of 'non-purchase' but that may be to tedious. * Retailers would be able to upload special sales, offers that are catered to customers interests. * Site also can form into a social network where you show your wardrobe and can 'trade' clothes with others. You can also put your clothes up for sale right there. *revenue* - Free to customer - Free for brands to upload their specs - Cost is when customer clicks on this 'match' button. We have per-click rates, and subscription rates *justification* - That one of the biggest holdups to online apparel shopping is that it won't fit right. This is a fast service that is easy to use. - This should increase customer purchases and alleviate fears of poor fitting. Also keeps shopping light with little math or calculations.

Collaborative effort between: 1. Alterations companies - get them to promote our services 2. Get customers to hear / see advantages 3. Get brands to see worthwhile advantage to uploading all this detail. That they will get more sell through b/c of confident buyers 4. Get retailers to post link on their site because it will help them alleviate buyers hesitations 5. gogocloset.com - to post and store all customers info for easy and quick reference.

How to we logistically program to have a 3rd part site bring all this information together? how difficult would it be to 'store images?" 1. LIFE A. Spirit 1) Do I love God, my Father with all my heart, soul, mind and strength? 2) Am I growing in my intimate relationship with Jesus Christ? 3) Am I living and walking by the Holy Spirit? 4) How is my time in the Scriptures? Am I delighting in and meditating on God’s Word day and night? 5) Do I find myself praying more or less about all things? 6) What 3 spiritual practices generated the greatest benefit?

B. Soul (Mind, Will and Emotions) 1) What am I doing to daily renew my mind? 2) Are my thoughts pure, lovely, noble, truthful, and full of praise? 3) What are the best three books I read last year? 4) What kind of choices did I make last year? 5) Did I choose the way of life versus death? Did I choose the way of the Spirit versus the way of the flesh? Did I choose to walk by faith versus walk by sight? 6) Was I full of love, joy, peace, patience and self-control? 7) Was there any anger, guilt, greed or jealousy that needs to be resolved?

C. Body (Did I live in B.A.L.A.N.C.E?) 1) BREATHING - Am I getting enough oxygen in my blood? 2) AWARENESS - Am I paying attention to what is going on in my body? 3) LIQUIDS - Am I drinking enough water? 4) ANTIOXIDANTS - Am I taking the right of Multi, C and E? 5) CONDITIONING - Am I exercising 3-5 times a week? 6) EFFECTIVE REST - Am I getting 7-8 hours of sleep? 7) What three ways will I take better care of myself this next year?

2. MARRIAGE A. Intimacy 1) Does my wife know she is the #1 priority relationship on the planet? 2) Am I loving my wife as Christ loves the church? 3) Are we praying together on a regular basis? 4) Are we regularly sharing what we are learning from our own relationship with Jesus Christ? 5) Am I washing and cleansing her with the Word of God? 6) Am I carefully listening to her thoughts, feelings and desires? 7) Are we enjoying many sexual and non-sexual touches? 8) Are we enjoying romance and physical intimacy on a regular basis? 9) Did we have an awesome anniversary celebration? 10) Have we enjoyed quarterly getaways? 11) Did we have our monthly MSM, Marriage Staff Meetings? 12) How was our “Weekly Focus” time? 13) Did I provide her the structure or spontaneity she needs and desires? 14) Did I give her the full and focused attention she deserves? 15) On a scale of 1-10, how would my wife rate our marriage? 16) What needs to be done to get it to a 10?

B. Finances 1) Did we honor the Lord with the first fruit of all our increase? 2) Did we give generously and cheerfully? 3) Did we save appropriately? 4) Did we invest for the future proportionately? 5) Did we spend moderately? 6) What financial adjustments must we make for this next year?

3. FAMILY A. Father 1) How am I doing as a Dad? 2) Am I walking humbly before my children? 3) Am I showing them unconditional love 4) What did I teach them this past year? What do they need to know? 5) Am I a model to follow? Can I say, “Follow me as I follow Christ?” 6) Am I spending the quality and quantity of time my children need? 7) Am I praying for them on a daily basis? 8) What “Etched Memories” did I create this past year? 9) What home activities tend to generate the greatest pay back?
B. Son 1) How am I doing as a son? 2) How did I honor my Father and Mother this past year?
C. Brother 1) How am I doing as a brother? 2) How did I love and care for my brothers and sisters?

4. WORK A. Did I see my work as a gift from God? B. Did I do my work as unto the Lord? C. Am I living as a man under authority showing respect, gratefulness, a servant and quiet spirit? D. Am I showing excellence and diligence in my work? E. Am I taking the low place and trusting God for His invitations, appointments and exaltation in His time? F. Am I “choosing to cheat”? G. What three work relationships need more time?
5. CHURCH/MINISTRY A. Am I living in community with other believers? B. Am I investing, influencing and inviting other outsiders? C. Where did I strategically serve in my local church?

notes.note: Today, may I exchange: my death for Your Abundant Life! my sin for Your righteousness my old man for Your new man. As I have received Christ Jesus, so may I walk in You this moment and throughout the day. Create in me a pure heart, O God, and renew a steadfast spirit within me. May I disappear today that Christ may be revealed. May His Life be the source of my thoughts, attitudes, words, will, emotions, and actions. This moment requires Divinity. This Day requires Divinity. I am not, but I am connected to who is. May I refrain from eating from the Tree of knowledge of good and evil, and eat only from the tree of Life. May I experience the fullness of Christ

*Invite OUT!* # MY Flesh - _my old man has been crucified_ # My Sin - _The side of me that still wants my own way._ # My old man - _The nature in my that fights against you._ # PRIDE! - _i am not._ # Fear - _I have a God who reigns._ # Worry - _He holds all things together that He wants to stand._ # Doubt - _Look at the faithfulness of the day. He is more so!_ # Negativity - _There are two ways to see it. Look at it with God who walks with me through the valley of the shadow of death._ # Bitterness - _All things see are temporary. He works them all for good._ # Impatience - _He will incline unto me as I wait on Him._ # Anger- _Vengeance is the Lord's_ # Slander - _Stop my foolish arrogance._ # Judgement - _I don't really know the hearts of man..._ *Invite IN!* # Christ in me - _Recognize the source!_ # Cleanliness - _To create in me a clean heart and a new spirit_ # Character - _To maintain the heart of Christ, humble, integrity_ # Conforming - _To the Life of Christ in me._ # Courage - _To walk by faith and in truth_ # Conquerer - _To recognize the path of destruction & flee or endure it._ # Concentration - _To focus on the topic at hand_ # Clarity - _To see what it is I'm being confronted with_ # Context - _To see the real picture_ # Comprehension - _To understand and know the issues at hand_ # Capacity - _To retain the knowledge and understanding long term_ # Compassion - _To hold others with love and respect_ # Charity - _To be the Love of Christ_ # Creativity - _To see and do things in new ways_ # Cheerfulness - _What a wonderful God we serve!_ # Communication - _To clearly communicate the things revealed_ # Competition - _A desire to work hard and run the race in every area of my life._ # Conviction - _To do the holy and righteous thing._ # Capital - _You own it all._ # Collateral - _I have nothing but what You give._ # Comfort - _You are the great Comforter. May I bear witness to that._ # Charm - _You speak words of edification and class. May those be my words._ # Competency - _As You are the true Scientist and Author, may I walk in the Light of Your truth. # Conditioning - _To run the race how it's designed. That in my frail body I would maintain it how it is to be cared for and prepared for Your work..._ # Care - for others! # Conscience & Un-Conscience - _Mind fixed on you._ # Un-Ceasing - _Prayer life!_ # Collaboration - _With Your Spirit and the people you bring across my way._
In Your mercy O Lord, I ask that You bring us new business. Lead us how to be established to handle the business we have and continue to grow.

---"Colossians":http://www.biblegateway.com/passage/?search=Colossians%201%20;&version=48; | "Galatians":http://www.biblegateway.com/passage/?search=galatians;&version=48; | "Proverbs":http://www.biblegateway.com/passage/?search=proverbs;&version=48; ---
*"The LORD is good, a stronghold in the day of trouble; and He knoweth them that trust in Him."* Nahum 1:7

I am more like the poor than not like them. They are my brethren. They are my family. I am poor. Lord how can I remember the poor? How can I keep a soft heart and a sensitive eye to those who lack even more than I? _Let me consider this does not only mean financial (although I am the one there!)_
The next 30 days are big transition. Jeremy moving, regroup for GMAT 2010, Oscar growing up, Finances put together, new class schedule. _Lord draw us near to You and to one another._

_Lord I pray You establish us in You. That we may live without fear, worry, doubt, or anger. That we may abide in You in peace, truth, and righteousness. For Your way is true and solid. You are the light and we are Your children. Keep us clean and atuned to Your voice. Set us up on a rock higher than we could climb in wisdom and understanding._
*Trust in the LORD with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.* *In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.*

Lord, I am trying to balance work, school, and home life but i'm finding huge deficit in our finances. 904 jones is creeping in and these medical bills are starting to come due. What should we do? Be glorified and have mercy on us.

*Schedule* - Not only having the time, but that it would be effective *School* - Grades, comprehension, and excellence *AMB3R* - Sales, Jeremy Established on equity, effectiveness, and efficiency. Bless Clay's search for business. *Home* - Down time, relational time, Financial management *904 Jones* - What do we do Lord? We want out.

I want to go the next 90 days in bed by 8:30 and up at 4:30 to prepare for the GMAT, Exercise, think, pray, and work. I want Danae to know I love and care for her. I do not want to squander this time.

We are supposed to be entering the busy season of tees. I am thankful to the Lord for what He supplied us with in North Point, Passion, and Bigstuf. They were my three biggest accounts but all haven't done as much as they used to. Amen. I am excited that we have many new accounts. I just want to submit to the Lord and His mercy that we would have a bountiful harvest this Summer. I trust the Lord as the giver of all sales. He alone controls what comes our way. _Lord, I ask in Your Mercy for blessings on our establishment, effectiveness, equity, systems, and sales. That you would build us on You - Sales Dept, Art Dept, Production Dept, and Marketing Dept. We need You or we are undone. Nevertheless You continue to prove Yourself faithful. AMB3R is indeed a seasonal experience, my prayer is that it would last into another solid season._ _UPDATE 9/24 - Looks like from June to August we did about $180,000 in sales and reached a point that was pretty overwhelming from a capacity standpoint. Thank the Lord we had the business we had! Things are still going and we are working hard to change our business model to the menu format. Thank You Lord for Your faithfulness and Mercies!_

AMB3R's re-establishment and attempt to move beyond 'startup' Couture's hearts Home life - relathional and bills all coming due Ouray - getting established GMAT - comprehension and scheduling... Self - my health... this chest thing is working me.

Art Pack - trying to get a pipeline of art working Menu - trying to create a few pre-made popular ways to do production Website - find ways to communicate what we do Hayes - Starting as a production assistant Clay - trying to land some big sales Est - Banking and LLC stuff Jeremy - confidence and effectiveness. _Lord, that You, in your mercy would establish us in wisdom, righteousness, effectiveness, efficiency, equity, and huge volume of sales! You have led us to this point, and I am thankful._
"Old man vs. New Man":http://docs.google.com/Doc?id=dd2xrz4j_171cb7nf8g6
"Proverbs":http://docs.google.com/Doc?id=dd2xrz4j_173ccsx88c4#Chapter_25_7602957715280354 | "Psalms":http://docs.google.com/Doc?id=dd2xrz4j_174dk9thz8x

1. GMAT - Time to study and true progress 2. AMB3R - Establishment, effectiveness, efficiency, and equity 3. Home life - truly established unto safety 4. Romance - May I learn to connect with Danae 5. Stewardship - Using the talents and treasures I've been given 6. Ouray - That I may learn and develop in that environment 7. Splish - What to do with that situation 8. DU - My education and preparation for the future. _I'm realizing that I should never think I've got it covered. Lord, this is Your life and I will press forward but let You lead as I know You do._
- website - menus - amb3r samples - workflows - agreements

Lord, I am confused and concerned about my marriage. Danae is sad and unhappy and I don't know what to do about it. Is there someone we can talk to here? I want to cast these cares on you and ask that you lead us out of the place of confusion and disconnect.

_Lord, I ask for Your grace and mercy that I may speak to danae with heart, feelings, words, and actions of Love and Tenderness. I have been a bull dozer and I need instruction and understanding. Let me show her the love she needs and deserves._

note.title: The revelation of Christ in me.

notes.note: I pray that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of glory, may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of Him, the eyes of your understanding being enlightened, that ye may know what is the hope of His calling, and what are the riches of the glory of His inheritance in the saints, *and what is the exceeding greatness of His power toward us who believe, according to the working of His mighty power,*
Our Marriage, Our Hearts, Our Home, Me, Our business, Our Ministry, Ouray, School, GMAT
Lord, in Your Mercy would You grant Danae and myself rest. I want her to know how much I love her.

Completed my GMAT course. I have homework to do now. I want to take this test in 90 days. Lord, I ask for Your mercy on my last trial with this material. That I would be able to study and gain ground on this test. I know what I need to do... Bless the fruits of my labor.
Let not my life be lip-service or a slow decline. Let not my mouth be shut from speaking the truth; That Jesus Christ is Lord of Lords!

_Father, make room for Yourself in my life and world. You, Your Son, and Your HOLY SPIRIT are welcome in everything surrounding who I am and what I do. Make room and do it by removing me. I am dead but You are ALIVE. I am everything I hate. You are everything I love and want. Be my peace. Be my hope. Be my purpose. Be my safety. Be my reason for living. Be the thought of my day. Lord, I want no more of me. I want You to make room in my heart. Just remove every aspect of the Old man and remove some more. Replace that old worthless nature for what is truly worth having. You are the source and creator of life. If I am not filled, I will be vile and useless, destructive and anti-Christ. Let it not be. Let Your mercies reign supreme and call me to a place higher than we could climb._

Lord, I want to surrender our path and journey to You. That You continue to lead, guide, and prepare the way in which we should walk. I surrender this GMAT and my studies of it. That I would continue to learn and grow. As this next quarter comes you would permit me to live by priority.. On the mind for the next 120 days: 1. amb3r website 2. gmat 3. fin 4500 (finding laptop and such to do the class.) 4. paying down debts 5. growing our marriage

note.title: A clean, pure, and humble heart

notes.note: _Lord, thank You for the blessings You have given me and my family. A firm ground to stand on, a good job, and a warm place to rest our heads. Let me know You more in this season too. Let me know You more than the season before. Let Christ be glorified and revealed in and through me. Let me not forget that You are the source of my success and growth._

_Lord, I have my school projects on my mind. Crystal ball - comprehending this modeling class, etc. I want to finish strong. Would You lead me in Your mercies and establish me. Also with AMB3R... Please in Thy Mercies lead us and establish us. This is not my business. I can't be any more convinced of that. But let me lead where You want me to be. I ask that You would continue to give us what we do not deserve. Bless Jeremy, this website and financial project. Let me continually praise thee for Your mercies and truth._

_Father keep my mind fixed on You. Many are the temptations and places to fall. Life is so fragile - I ask is Thy mercy to keep us. I know I possess only death and wickedness in my flesh. Not until I am with You, born again, will this battle be over completely. I call on You in a gracious exchange by faith. That every day You know I need You, more than I realize. My sin for Your righteousness. My death for Your Life. I surrender my family, home, work, and goals unto Your will and glory. Lead us in the way we should go. I ask for Your blessings on AMB3R - Sales, establishment, effectiveness, efficiencies, and glory unto You. Bless Jeremy and Aaron. Please continue to grow my insight with how to view situations in Ouray. Please fill me with Your romance heart for Danae - that I may continue to woo her. Last, let me continue with You blessings and wisdom on this GMAT pursuit! (620 on my 1st of 6 practice exams)_
_Create in me a pure heart, soul, mind, and body_. It's time to put away childish things. Smoking, drinking, and anything unclean.

I take the GMAT for the last time in 10 days. _Father, I surrender and ask for Your mercies on my remaining study schedule, comprehension, focus, and content. I accept Your wisdom and plan for our lives. No matter what happens with this test, Lord You reign supreme! I thank You for the opportunity to work and develop the skills and discipline needed to accomplish such a difficult task._ My goal is a 700! -- _9/8/10 - I scored a 600 and that was what I was trying to overcome so I am so grateful!!_

Into every being and area of my life; AMB3R - policies, procedures, practices, people, profits, margins, Ouray - Lessons, people, projects, purpose My heart- Lord, let me live as You my Rock and Redeemer. Let me never limit what You can do. Marriage - Make it a new relationship with Danae. That we may unite as one, in You.
Father, what should I do with this news of Jeremy's cancer? How does this impact AMB3R and what we're supposed to do? Please, in Thy mercy, grant us wisdom and understanding.

note.title: Your Mercy and Strength and wisdom

notes.note: _Father, I need You. I need Your peace. Your Spirit. Your guidance. Lord, lead me in the way in which I should go. I have stumbled as it comes to what to do with Ouray, AMB3R, and balancing all these things. I need You and Your mercy to establish and protect us. Lord, You have brought us this far and I believe we are on the path. Let me keep the faith. Let me remain faithful to You and why you've created me. Let me know what it means to be a righteous and wise steward full of faith. Have Mercy on AMB3R. Have mercy on Ouray. Have mercy on the work of my hands. Let us reap what we've been sowing. Let us sit in a place and say "THE LORD IS FULL OF COMPASSION AND MERCY!_

_Father we have been working at this journey for over two years. You have endured and sustained us. Wells is now a month new. Two weeks until these applications are due. Please lead and guide my mind, time, and words. Be my life..._

_Lord, that You would renew our strength. That You would bring a fresh Wind & fresh Fire into my home, marriage, and journey. We can see the finish line for DU and applying to b-school. That You would guide us and protect us and bless our Journey, that all will see what You have done with and through the Woodall household. Lord, grant us in Thy Mercy a clear path to Harvard._
_So we fix our eyes not on what is seen, but on what is unseen, since what is seen is temporary, but what is unseen is eternal._ _May You lead me on a journey that keeps my soul stirred._ (2/25/10)

_Lord we are running low on supplies - mental, physical, and spiritual. In Your Mercies, would You revive us with a 2nd wind, a fresh wind and renewed breath. May the sight of the finish line create an excitement as we near the turn of a season. Lead us to B-school. Lead us in Thy way. Guide us in wisdom and establish us in truth. We want to know You and see You glorified and revealed in and through us and our marriage. Let this story be one of inspiration and testimony to the reality that You can do anything. Let us find rest and favor. Bless us Lord, not because of ourselves, but because of the goodness to Your children._

_Lord, in these applications are due in a month. Wharton due 2 weeks. You have brought us this far and we are weary but enduring because of You. I call out for Your divine strength and intercession on what remains. Editing these essays, Jeremy's recommendations, resume, and additional comments. I am not capable of doing these things. I want to abide in Your pasture for You are my Father and Shepherd._

note.title: Lean not on our own understanding...

notes.note: _Wharton is due a week from today. We found out our house is to be put up for sale. The adventure continues and I love that unless You show up, we are undone. We trust You to lead and guide us in the way we should go. You are doing great things in and through us and I pray that Christ Jesus would be revealed in and through me. That the mysteries of Christ would be shown to Danae and myself as we walk in this beautifully tragic world._

_Father, let me hear the wisdom taught at B-school. Let me hear the wisdom taught at Harvard. I want to be prepared and connected as I continue in life. I do not consider a graduate degree something that supersedes Your power and influence on my life, but I seem to live a very secular Christianity. I do not want to remain trapped in a paycheck to paycheck life. I want to make a difference. Make some money. And have the feedom to minister beyond the work place. I do believe you have called me to a ministry of the workplace, but I don't want to be limited to it. I want to be all that you have called me to be. I ask, in Your mercy, that You would grant me admission to Harvard. Regardless, I trust You and I know that eternity is my home. I know what You have in store for me, your child, cannot be fathomed. You love me and my desire is to love you too._

note.title: I need You.
note.em: Father, I am 33 years old. I have sought out life and to live it right. What am I to do? Where am I to go? What have You called me to be? I have tried to succeed as a entrepreneur, designer, manager, and more. Teach me Your ways O Lord. I have fought so hard for B-school with such little ability. The rest is up to You. My rest is up to You... Let me find Your peace that passes understanding. I am a lost and wandering sheep. Please let me know I am on You path, and graze as a sheep should. I don't know what to do with AMB3R. I don't know what to do about an MBA. I don't know what to do to establish my home with equity. I don't know what to do about my career. I don't know what it means to live above mediocrity. I just don't know... I know I need You LORD. I know I am not strong. I know I have no power. I know I cannot live without Jesus. I don't want to sedate myself here. I want to confront a situation with God on my side, as my Life and Hope. Let me live in the reality that I am a Child Of God.

notes.note: _Father, I am in the situation that feels like I am headed for a cliff. I am in a dark room and I have no idea what is going on. I am quitting everything around me for a future that is not guaranteed, and is above my head. I am walking in the valley of the shadow of death. I want to trust You. I want this to be our time to grow close. I want this to be the place You shape me into a man of God. Let me be still and hear Your voice. I am trying to walk in a spirit of truth, wisdom, and life. Lord, I don't have the strength to handle faith. I need this to be Your faith. I need this to be Your plan. I don't have what it takes to succeed._

We have notified our landlords, bosses, and schools. We have packed our bags. We have prepared a summer vacation to revitalized our home. We have prayed and sought counsel. We have asked the Lord to lead us in the way we should go. I have requested the Lord to set us on a rock higher than we could climb. I see a story of deliverance I want to tell. I see a journey through the wilderness I want to proclaim the supernatural guidance of the Shepard. I am in a holding cell and I confess that unless the Lord shows up, all bets are off. _Father, I wanted to be in this place that You would reveal Christ in and through me. I trust this is how I am seeing the True God live and lead._ --- The Lord shared with me a personally profound revelation, that seems to be a basic one. As I've prayed "Lord, my spirit is Yours. I had a possession misunderstanding. I was praying like - Dave's spirit is yours to have. But the Lord brought to my attention that I had it wrong. In all actuality the Spirit inside me is His - literally! The Holy Spirit is in me and my spirit was exchanged at the cross. A basic concept that I should have known this whole time. Maybe I knew it, but didn't accept it with true faith. Praise the LORD I am not my own! _Father, let Your Spirit inside me influence what I say, think, feel, and do. Let Your mysterious power be revealed in and through me as we walk this time of faith. I need You._

_Father I trust You have a plan, working for good and unto Your glory. We are so thankful for You continued mercy, grace, and blessings. As we find out the way that You are leading over the next weeks and months, we want to keep our trust and plans in You. We are fasting from our natural tendencies to plan and think on the future. Let our lives be aligned with Your kingdom. Let our hearts be transformed by Your nature. Let Your spirit teach us and conform us to Christ. Let us all be one in You._

Kellogg begins in 18 days, but I am still on the wait list. It's crazy sensation because Ouray has hired my replacement. AMB3R is losing business, not really growing. The Lewis's are ready for us to move out of their house. Danae and I love the idea of Chicago. We're just wondering why we haven't been accepted. We want the revelation of Christ in us, more so than our plans or desires. _Lord, what would you have us to do?_ We are trying to make the most of this time, but it's hard to be present in the moment when all feels past-due... _Lord, let us find Your mercies and truth in this moment. We want You to be glorified and this story to end with the name of Jesus being praised. Should we push even harder to move, or should we stop and wait? Let us hear from You._

note.button: "Be revealed in and through my life!"

notes.note: _Father, You are the One that made the vast universe. You are the One that manufactured the invisible micro world. You are the One that designed all life, purpose, and eternal destiny. As Your weakest vessel, I request Your Kingdom come. You will be done. Your Name be glorified. Your Life to be revealed in and through me. Through a surrender, my request is that I become filled with Your ideas and Your encouragement. I am walking in uncertain times. I ask for Your inspiration. Your magnificent view and wisdom. Teach me O Lord the way of equity and truth._ Even more specifically; - What I am to learn regarding the web. (Languages, platforms, projects) - Re-applying to Harvard & Kellogg. What I should say in my final essays and actual application. - Next steps with AMB3R - how to manage JP/AG, and growth. - Ouray Employment - identifying a clear role - Home finances - finding a solution that works for both Danae and myself.

_I do not know where to go or what I should put my hand to. I ask for You Lord, to be glorified. Your rule is gracious. Your law is love. I want what You want. I want a life of surrender to Your Life. Teach me in the way in which I should go. I am on a journey that involves only my story. The story You are weaving in me. I am on no race. I am walking where You want me to go. I am becoming conformed to the man You want me to be. Riches, glory, honor, power, and fame all belong to You. May I ignore all of these momentary pursuits and keep my focus on Christ and the ministry before me. May I care for the family You have entrusted with me. May I be a faithful steward._

_Lord, I want your ideas. Stoke the fire of my thoughts with Your ideas. Stoke the fires of my heart with Your love. Let me serve You. Let me serve Danae. Let me serve as Christ served the church. Let me put off my old man, crucified. Let the Life of Christ be produced further with every breath._

note.title: Dave 2.1
note.em: Lord, You have made me, sustained me, and You now lead me. What should I do with my current situation of work, debts, and how to move next with AMB3R?

notes.note: _Father, as I look to start working Full time with AMB3R, I ask that You cover that company in Your grace and mercy. I do not want to go back to the hole that You lifted me out of. I am fearful of debt and despair. Let me be reminded that You walk with me through these winter months. You are the One that I want to serve. I want to be a servant to You, Danae, Oscar, Wells, Jeremy, Aaron, and our customers. How many I learn to serve? How may I serve more people? Teach me Your ways. I ask that You set me on a rock higher than I could climb..._
_Lord, Danae is sad. We are in a strange place. We need You._

Harvard notified me a month ago that I was denied and today I received word that Kellogg has denied me to full-time MBA as well. Wow, I can't even try to think of all that I had invested to attend a full time program.... I have to trust the Lord. I want to trust Him even more. I want to rest in the peace that He knew this day would come - from before the time I was born. Lord, thank You that You know what You're doing. Thank You that You know what I'm doing. Thank You that *Truly God is Good*.

The Lewis' sold their house and we have to be out in four days. Ouray, Full Time MBA, and now Nielsen have all come to a close. AMB3R is not paying for our expenses and I seriously do not know where we are moving to. I have applied to a programming apprenticeship with a 4% acceptance rate. If that doesn't work out in the next day, then I'm going to turn my focus toward moving to Chicago - where nothing is opened there either. _Lord, I am sad and embarrassed to be in this situation again. To be in a hole with no direction in sight. I don't know who to be mad. My weaknesses are again exposed. You brought us out before but I have fallen again. Please, in Thy Mercy - reach out and save us. We need a Miracle. We need You. I can't handle this..._

I am looking for people to do community with. To me, community is people who sharpen and help one another. Am I missing what community is? Or, am I still searching? I want to discuss scripture, heart, relationships, physical, and intellectual. I want to grow as a husband, father, and man. I know I want to help people. I want to be in a place that I can also address my flaws and weaknesses. But I don't ever seem to get to those points. _Lord, I am wrong. You are perfectly capable. My sickness is my doubt. I choose to fear and worry, instead of see fully that Your hand is holding a mighty staff. You know the way, and You will always know the way. You are here and this time is meant for more than I will know this side of eternity._

Prayers - that I may die, that Christ may live. - That the Holy Spirit may awaken the dead parts of my heart. - that I may rest in the truth that God my Father is working all things together for good. - Let my story not end in ruin.

2013 was as much a whirlwind as 2012. 2014 starts with sadness. We had but 2 short weeks with Olivia before she went home. I had such a different expectation for what our lives were going to be like. That we had turned the corner and were going to start going. Clearly from these comments, my view is that we are still in the wilderness. But now, one of a different kind. I'm working at livingsocial, but for what? What should I be doing?

Olivia is gone. My wife is in a daze. We don't know what is happening. Should we slow down? Should we keep going? What are we supposed to be doing? I just feel like I'm back to my routine of trying to learn to code. But, I'm not mentally the same. I'm shaken. I'm wondering what am I doing. I'm wondering how I'm to keep my head above financial waters if I stop doing what I'm doing. I know the Lord hears me. I know He sees me. I'm trying to be still for Him and Danae, but also keep going with the boys and with work. So, I guess I'd say I'm torn in the process..

It's occurring to me that I'm not going to have a business that is run solely by myself. I keep imagining that I'll be able to start a company on the side with no help. But, the more I learn about coding and all the facets of business, the more I see that there is more than I can do. My initial feeling is disappointment. That somehow, I'm then never going to be able to go into business. I'm not entirely sure what my focus is at that 'end stage'. I can admit that I really enjoy the solitude of coding. I enjoy the building and seeing something tangible. I have this picture in my mind where I'll be building something on the side while I'm working a day job. Then, there comes a tipping point where I have enough cashflow from the side job that I can quit my day job. I wonder if the process is actually through working for another startup at some point. Or, possibly continuing with freelance work. TBD

I am so prepared to lose my job at livingsocial. Why? Because it's been my track record. That I don't know enough coding to be considered a developer. But, let's say I am able to stay. Why would I be there? I'd be able to focus my dev skills as a front and back end developer. Learning moderately advanced Ruby & Javascript through the process. I'd also be exposed to how a real company operates, doing $1B in sales. And, get to see how the big boys use libraries and other team related activities. I have this feeling that people who get into corporate loose their entrepreneurial spirit. And that's something I'm nervous of. But why? Not that it's paid off for me, but that I've invested so much time into that mentality. But Lord, I want to change. All these paths on this planet led to death, except Your path. Your Way. May I discover what Your way is for me.

I'm getting back into backpack after a year away. I am thinking about how much backpack worked for me so I relucatantly made a switch to evernote. It's strange in that I had a system that worked but stopped it. Now, I want to get it back. - highrise for contacts / people - backpack for information - slack for group chat - github / trello / basecamp for project mgmt i tried every other idea thinking that 'technology' was the solution. but this product that is now even discontinued - is proof that simple and effective is beyond technology. basecamp 3 is starting to feel that. But I would argue that their latest design is a significant step back from even this current backpack design. It's just purple bubbles smashed on top of bc 2's design. very odd... but this is where i want to introduce sortpop

haha fun to be writing an old post like this. wow I can't even remember the last time I wrote in this form. But this is what I love about backpack! It's so fluid for the moment and idea size. so anyway, I'm asking the Lord _Lord, what am I to do?_ And now that I see that I'm praying, I think of this entire note as a new prayer request. Lord, may we return to that time and see just how off I must have been? - paycheck planner app - lemonade stand as part of my job search - joel glovier and dev tees? - sortpop as an email

I am lost but I find refuge in knowing You, O Lord, light the path for my feet. I am so unsure of where to go. My prayer today is that I may quiet my soul and spirit to hear Your voice. May it be something of _good news_. I have lived so long without and am down below the stump. Danae has left me 4 weeks now and she seems to have no change of heart for why she left. She is cordial, at best. I miss my sons and fear for their growth, safety, and hearts. Lord, I give them to You. Only they can make the choice to bend their knees to You. - Danae - Oscar - Wells - Courage - Coding - Career - Finances - Debts - Stock Market - Gold - Moving to GA, in with my parents - Next steps - My heart.

image.description: _1/6/9_ I thought this looked like my brain; I ran out of room on my full plate so I got a bigger surface area. Work, school, marriage, MBA stuff, bills, all need my attendion

page.title: √ 1% club Member!

items.item: compile addresses and email addresses for semi-annual / annual newsletter
Step 8: Identify ways to overcome obstacles

I have been working alone now for 3 years. But not in a way of ownership. Working for a company that I had given the benefit of the doubt was effective. I've discovered though, that Jon is not a leader by his own admission. He has, on occasion, told me that I am a better leader than him. He stated it last time I was in MT this past summer. The combination of a company being spread to thin to supply me with resources. And my lack of real clarity on what projects I should focus on vs. acquiring new sales has made these years a very murky place to work. I have survived by the grace of God alone. Our products have been reasonably priced and our website is sub-par at best. My work situation is so unsatisfactory that it awakened me to the idea of Grad School. I am so pumped to be focused on returning to school. However, I have a new look on Futureshirts. I am looking to implement a plan of management where Danae can help me and I will also be able to do my daily tasks from Denver. *Question* Why are my sales not at $750k a year? I would say distractions and poor leadership. What can I change to do $750 in sales in 2008? # Cold Calls # follow up with current clients # Templates on Basecamp to handle more business # Grace and favor of the LORD # Few trips to CO Springs # Strengthening my bonds with Top 7 clients * brochures * Samples * Cards * Trips / Visits
My recreation is what gets my blood flowing and muscles strong. I enjoy the workouts and the development of my body. It keeps my mind sharp and refreshed. It will keep me in the game for the long haul. By skipping out of those necessary 3 hrs a week, I am loosing years on the back end of my life. It is essential that I maintain a steady schedule of physical care. In addition, setting audacious goals for my recreation will help keep the mundane and routine pushing for a goal. Dave Woodall Mission Statement / Core Values Core Values: Walk with God and become a “not” Christ be formed and revealed in me Swallow Spiritual meat Live Wisely Live life to the fullest adventure Christ planned for me Help others achieve and get what they want in life Mission statement: To be faithful and full of faith, hope, and love. Definition of Mission: “Faithful” To stick to the tasks, projects, relationships, and circumstances that God places me in. To be diligent, hard working, a positive attitude and a model in all that I do. I acknowledge that the LORD’s will is always done. I believe He holds a far greater plan and purpose than I can even set out. I believe that He causes all things to work for good. I believe that there are circumstances I would not choose and are unpleasant, yet they are shaping in me character, perseverance, faith, and hope. I believe that Christ is in me and has a plan since before time Scripture Ref: Ephesians 2:10, Phil 1:6, Ps 138:8, Eph 1:17-19 “Full of Faith” Without faith it is impossible to please God. I want to live life with a full grasp on eternal and unseen things. I want to live life with a higher perspective, knowing that what is seen is temporary and part of the way Christ is being revealed in me. I believe that I have a destiny and purpose in the heavens that is of royal status, position, and wealth. I believe that this earth is the place where we are prepared for eternity and to be ‘fit for heaven’. I believe I (as well as all mankind) need to be taught that we are not God, and that our existence is not about us. Scripture Ref: Eph 1, Gen 5:21, Heb, Phil 2, ”Full of Hope” I believe that God has plans of wealth and prosperity for us His Children. I believe that life is an opportunity to expose who God is and what He can accomplish with a life wholly deveoted to Him. I believe He has called us to a life of adventure, and excitement. I believe that Hope is a currency that can nourish my soul when the dark days come. I believe dark days will come, and hope can be a light to help me through them. Hope that I have a purpose, God is involved, and His plans for me are out of a place of love and preparation. Scripture Ref: Rom 5, “Full of Love” Love is the greatest of these. It is what Christ is toward man at the core. Out of love flows mercy, peace, kindness, joy, and happiness. God is love and love the way God can flow through me. I believe love is the way to intereact with man. Full of love is the way to combat evil. It is evidence that God exists. Scripture Ref: 1 Cor 13, 1 John Why I write goals To be on purpose and glean all that life has to offer. That as Christ develops Himself in and through me, I will live a life full of excitement and passion. My ideal result of goals That I have a list of things to set my mind and time to. I prioritize by importance and timeliness. So that I can utilize my time and not squander it.

notes.note: During orientation, you will get introduced to a variety of concepts including values based leadership, global innovation, and business professionalism. The readings required prior to orientation are meant to spark new growth in your critical thinking. We want you to consider a few key ideas: How teams will play a role in your education and in your business success. How decision making is enhanced through professional value systems. How innovation and change are a part of leadership. How self awareness is the starting point for 21st Century leadership. The role that trust plays in contributorship and discretionary productivity. The interconnectedness of our shrinking world.
• Model the Way. • Inspire a Shared Vision. • Challenge the Process. • Enable Others to Act. • Encourage the Heart.

“leaders learn by leading,and they learn best by leading in the face ofobstacles.As weather shapes mountains,problems shape leaders.Difﬁcult bosses,lack ofvision and virtue in the executive suite,circumstances beyond their control,and their own mistakes have been the leaders’basic curriculum.”3In other words,leaders are learners.They learn from their failures as well as their successes.

The climb to the top is arduous and long.People become exhausted,frus- trated,and disenchanted.They’re often tempted to give up.Leaders encour- age the heartoftheir constituents to carry on.Genuine acts ofcaring uplift the spirits and draw people forward.Encouragement can come from dramatic gestures or simple actions.

In business the able man ordinarily earns a larger income than one less able. So does the able man in the recognized professions--in law, medicine or engineering; and even in those professions more remote from money-making, like the ministry, teaching or social work. The world's demand for efficiency is so great and the supply so small, that the price of efficiency is high in every field of human activity.

Real success in business is to be found in achievements comparable rather with those of the artist or the scientists, of the inventor or the statesman. And the joys sought in the profession of business must be like their joys and not the mere vulgar satisfaction which is experienced in the acquisition of money, in the exercise of power or in the frivolous pleasure of mere winning.

The Filenes have thus accepted and applied the principles of industrial democracy and of social justice. But they have done more--they have demonstrated that the introduction of industrial democracy and of social justice is at least consistent with marked financial success. They assert that the greater efficiency of their employees shows industrial democracy and social justice to be money-makers. The so-called "practical business man," the narrow money-maker without either vision or ideals, who hurled against the Filenes, as against McElwain, the silly charge of being "theorist," has been answered even on his own low plain of material success.
*contingency theory*; which is the belief that to implement change, effective leaders do whatever the circumstances require.

I can imagine only one course that will be effective in winning converts to Christ's message of brotherly love. Christ must begin with the people closest to him in the crowd. First, he must get their attention. Anyone who has ever tried to engage strangers in conversation knows that there is only one certain way to do this: ask them questions about themselves. The opposite clearly won't work: if a would-be leader starts off by talking about personal concerns- personal values, beliefs, or ambitions-people will simply pay no attention. However, if the leader listens carefully to what the potential followers say they need and want and responds thoughtfully, they will become engaged in the process because they will have been given what they all crave: respect.

All moral and effective leaders so illuminate their followers' better sides, revealing what is good in them and thus ultimately giving them hope. This hope, this transcendent vision of a New Jerusalem, encompasses the followers' needs and aspirations-yet it is a better place than they could imagine on their own.

Relatedly, the leader has no options when it comes to the practical issue of spreading the gospel. Can we imagine any way whereby Christ, acting alone, could convey his message to everyone in the crowd? No, it is clear that he must create disciples. He has no choice but to inspire others to lead the transformation as well. To be an effective leader, no one can remain a solo operator (even with the aid of television). Instead, one must become a leader of leaders. Christianity did not depend on Christ personally; it did not depend on the force of his personality, his charm, or, for that matter, his "media persona" (if one naively insists that technology can solve the human problem of leadership). The ultimate measure of Christ's leadership is that the movement he founded continued to spread after his death. In fact, from the moment of his first conversions, Christianity belonged not to Christ but to the Christians.

• What are the causes of resistance to change? – • How can leaders effectively and morally overcome that resistance? • Why is the dominant philosophy of leadership, based on contingency theory, neither effective nor a moral guide for people who wish to lead change?

Leaders overcome this chronic and inevitable pattern of resistance in only one way: by building an alternative system of belief and allowing others to adopt it as their own. That is the essence of values-based leadership. Moreover, to effect true change, one must become a leader of leaders, one who inspires others to lead the transformation. Such leadership is difficult to achieve because no formula, no documentable technique, and no replicable skill is involved. Instead, values-based leadership is an attitude about people, philosophy, and process. To overcome the resistance to change, one must be willing, for starters, to change oneself. In essence, then, values-based leadership is "unnatural."

The official reason given for their choice. They were said to have been chosen because they each represent one of the major themes of American history: the founding (Washington), political philosophy (Jefferson), preservation of the Union (Lincoln), and expansion and conservation (TR).

Jefferson understood that in a democracy, there could be no such thing as the leader; instead, there must be a leader of leaders (a topic of subsequent chapters). Indeed, all four Rushmoreans, each recognized widely as a great leader, were suspicious of leadership as it is commonly defined. In their writings they expressed the concern that too much leadership—particularly of the wrong kind—is tyranny.

Washington thus established the democratic ideal of the leader as servant. To him leadership meant responsibilities, not privileges. With the exception of Cincinnatus, Pericles, and a handful of others, leaders had always ruled to meet their own needs; Washington led to achieve the ends of the people. His ability to diffuse his courage and optimism among his troops—and, later, among the American public—was a by-product of the trust he had earned by serving them. He had not promised the people he led much in terms of victory, glory, or abundance; he won their loyalty instead through deeds and by example. He asked no one to make a sacrifice that he himself was unwilling to make; he sought no financial reward for his service. The public’s trust in him grew out of his manifest integrity; his ability to lead emanated from his willingness to serve. He imposed no doctrine on his people; instead, he came to symbolize their aspirations and their needs. In these important respects he was much like Kemal Ataturk, Gandhi, de Gaulle, Martin Luther King Jr., and others who would follow as either “fathers” of their nations or as the first to serve where no one had previously dared.

Teachers must have ideas. Great teaching is about something, and what the Rushmoreans were about was the creation of the good society through the process of democratic change. The ideas of liberty, equality, and natural rights enunciated in the second paragraph of the Declaration of Independence recur throughout the public statements and private writings of all four Rushmoreans. Lincoln said that he “never had an idea that didn’t stem from the Declaration.” Leaders without ideas are about power; the Rushermoreans were about the empowerment of the people through democracy.

Contemporary critics accused each of the four presidents of being calculatingly ambitious—and the critics were probably not far off the mark. No one becomes president of the United States (or leader of much of anything) without ambition. Even the saintlike Gandhi, when asked why he had gone to England, would answer, “Ambition!” That thoughtful scholar of presidential leadership, James MacGregor Burns, reminds us that the real question is, “Ambition for what?” In the case of the Rushmoreans, it was ambition in the cause of idealism. That may sound like a contradiction in terms, but it is not. Burn’s book, Leadership,” is replete with such paradoxes, and the proof that idealism and ambition can beat in the same heart is found in the lives of these four presidents. They brought about change by pursuing moral ends that their followers would ultimately adopt as their own, ends that derived from the real needs of their followers.

_Will this action serve a worthwhile purpose?_ * What are we trying to accomplish? * What are our short-term and long-term goals? * Are these goals worthwhile? If so, then how do they contribute to people's lives? * Will the course of action we're considering contribute to achieving these goals? * If this is not the most efficient and effective course, do we have a sound basis for pursing on the proposed path?

_Is this action consistent with relevant principles?_ * What norms of conduct are relevant in this situation - Including those found in law, customary practice, industry codes, company guidelines or the emerging body of generally accepted ethical principals? * What are our duties under these standards? * What are best practices under these standards? * Does the proposed action honor the applicable standards? * If not, do we have a sound basis for departing from those standards? * Is the proposed action consistent with our own espoused standards and ideals?

_Does this action respect the legitimate claims of the people likely to be affected?_ * Who is likely to be affected both directly and indirectly, by the proposed action? * How will these parties be affected? * What are the parties rights, interests, expectations and concerns as derived by law, agreement, custom, past practice, explicit norms or other sources? * Does our plan respect the legitimate claims of the affected parties? * If not, what are we doing to compensate for this infringement? * Have we mitigated unnecessary harms? * Are there alternatives that would be less harmful or more beneficial on balance? * Have we taken full advantage of opportunities for mutual benefit?

_Do we have the power to take this action?_ * What is the scope of our legitimate authority in view of relevant laws, agreements, understandings, and stakeholder expectations? * Are we within our rights to pursue the proposed course of action? * If not, have we secured the necessary approvals or consent from the relevant authorities? * Do we have the resources, including knowledge and skills, as well as tangible resources required to carry out the proposed action? * If not, do we have the ability to marshal the needed resources?

While these questions are thourough, I wonder if they tend toward to analysis paralysis. I don't find that these are easily answered questions for the small or medium sized business. I feel like a few subscriptions to Lexus/Nexus the major corporation is the one who could afford a think tank to ask and accurately answer these questions. This is not for when a decision needs to be started, but when a action has presented itself in motion. This is not stored energy questions, but the kenetic power of motion and how to chart potentially dangerous waters.

The accounting precourse will focus on Understanding the Financial Statements, which includes the following: # Identify the purpose and content of the balance sheet. Explain the meaning of assets, liabilities, and stockholders’ equity. # Identify the purpose and content of the income statement. Explain the meaning of revenues and that they are usually recognized independently of the related cash inflows. Explain the meaning of expenses and that expenses are usually recognized independently of the related cash outflows. # Identify the purpose and content of the cash flow statement. Explain the differences between operating, investing, and financing activities # Explain the need for the four types of adjusting entries, thereby reinforcing that Generally Accepted Accounting Principles (GAAP) are based on the accrual concept (and are not cash based). # Analyze the effects of basic transactions and events on the three financial statements (using the accounting equation format). # Prepare a balance sheet and income statement and identify types of cash flows. # Explain the relationships among the three financial statements. For example, if a transaction amount changes, can you trace the effects through all three financial statements? The suggested reading is Chapters 1-3 from Bazley, Financial Accounting: Concepts and Uses (8th edition). You are encouraged to select any questions and problems that help reinforce your learning and check your answers with the solutions provided. During the first class period of ACTG 4610, you will be required to take a test that covers the material in the three chapters and that will be part of your grade in that class.

# Is this a continuous or a categorical analysis?

You have a measurement variable which is continuous, and a categorical variable with two values. Objective: to see whether and how the measurement variable is different for the two groups. Simple example: you are measuring height (the continuous measurement variable) for people who are either male or female (gender is the categorical variable with two values). The objective is to compare heights of males with heights of females. Another example: you are measuring improvement scores for acrophobia (the continuous measurement variable) for patients who had either the standard treatment or the new treatment (treatment type is the categorical variable with two levels). The objective is to see which treatment method gives the best improvement scores. In your Minitab worksheet, your data is arranged in two columns. It may be paired (e.g. open up DS 9.2.1 Production Line Assembly Methods) or it may be unpaired (e.g. open up DS 9.6.4 Consumer Complaints Division Reorganization). (Note: if you have unpaired data it may be stacked – see Minitab analysis for two-sample tests)

*This is similar to two-sample tests, except now there are three or more groups being compared.* So, you have a measurement variable which is continuous, and a categorical variable with three or more values. Objective: to see whether and how the measurement variable is different for the various groups. Simple example: you are measuring weight at six months (the continuous measurement variable) for babies who are either drinking milk formula 1, milk formula 2, or milk formula 3 (milk formula type is the categorical variable with three values). The objective is to compare weights for the different milk formula types. Another example: you are measuring quality scores (the continuous measurement variable) for six different carpet types (carpet type is the categorical variable with six levels). The objective is to see which carpet types give the best quality scores. --- Ask a question 1. what do we want to find out? (continuous or categorical data set) _ex: length of time, total sales_ 2. What are the options we're going to measure? (Option 1 vs. option 2 vs. option 3) _per highway, per city_

You have two continuous variables which are paired together, so that you would want to view the data with a scatter plot. Each dot on the scatter plot is an “experimental unit.” Objective: to see whether there is any evidence that the two variables are related, and if so, to use one variable to predict the other. Simple example: you are measuring the heights of children (one continuous variable) together with their ages (the other continuous variable). Each child measured is an “experimental unit.” The objective is to model how heights change with age. Another example: you are measuring electricity consumption for a factory (one continuous variable) together with production level (the other continuous variable). The calendar months are the “experimental units.” The objective is to use production level to predict electricity consumption. In your Minitab worksheet, your data is arranged in two columns (e.g. open up DS 12.11.10 Downloading Co --- using a scatter plot graph objective - to see if the two variables are related. _EX: height and age - does height work with age?_ Unit | Height | Age 1 | 55" | 5 2 | 34" | 4

Example: Question: How long does it take to run a marathon with: a. how long we trained b. weight unit: 1 runner / or / lots of runners variable: times -- Question: Question (aka "continuous output variable") - fan attendance _ex: fuel consuption_ Input a. Temperature _ex: temperature of the day_ input b. Number of wins _ex: how old the car is_ input c. Number of players on disabled experimental Unit: Games _Ex: different cars_

Does Co-headlining a tour increase profit? - Better Ticket means higher attendance. - Higher attendance means more merch sales. Analysis - Reports from 2 different tours Fall 07 - Co-headline 40 Cities (Sept - Nov 2007) Spring 08 - Opening bands 30 Cities (March - May) Methods 1.) 2 Sample T - Comparison of the tour dates 2.) Multiple linear Regression Total Sales to Attendance & Merch Sales 3.) Simple linear Regression Attendance to Merch Sales Attendance to Total Sales 4.) ANOVA - Sales from (W/ Co-head / W/o Co-head) --- Project Context: Switchfoot is no longer on a record label and are responsible wholey for their touring, income, and all things related to their music career. They have to pay their management They have enlisted me to help them know where to spend their time and know if they can spend their time elsewhere. *Slides* 1. Cover 2. Roleplay setting 3. Objective 4. Provide suggestions for ideal partner bands 5. Data set reviewing 6. Summary of Analysis 7. 2 Sample T - Comparison of the tour dates data 8. Graphs 9. Multiple linear Regression Data 10. Total Sales to Attendance & Merch Sales graphs 11. Simple linear Regression Data 12. Attendance to Merch Sales visuals 13. Attendance to Total Sales visuals 14. ANOVA 15. Sales from (W/ Co-head / W/o Co-head) graph

Record labels are facing difficult challenges in the digital age. They are consolidating down to a minimal few due to plunging CD and Record Sales. Gold selling artists are having difficulty landing or keeping their Label deals. Bands are becoming involved with every aspect of their careers. Switchfoot is one such band that has sold over a million albums who now are without a record deal. With limited time to do all the necessary responsibilities of recording, touring, merchandise, and licensing deals, the band is interested in knowing if it's worth the extra time and money to partner with another band of equal stauture to tour. Based off two tours, I will analyze their data to try to determine if it's more profitable to enlist another band or just tour on their own credibility.

V.F.Corporation (VF) is engaged in branded lifestyle apparel and related products. VF owns a portfolio of brands in the jeanswear, outerwear, packs, footwear, sportswear and occupational apparel. The products are marketed to consumers shopping in specialty stores, upscale and traditional department stores, national chains and mass merchants. VF’s businesses are organized into product categories and brands called coalitions and consist of Jeanswear, Outdoor, Imagewear, Sportswear and Contemporary Brands. On February 28, 2007, VF acquired substantially all the operating assets of Majestic Athletic, Inc. (Majestic) and related companies. Subsequently, on August 31, 2007, VF acquired Seven For All Mankind, LLC (Seven For All Mankind), marketer of the 7 For All Mankind brand of women’s and men’s denim jeanswear and related apparel products in the United States and Europe.

We have asked for a great deal of information throughout this application and now invite you tell us about yourself. Using four slides or less, please provide readers with content that captures who you are. : We have set forth the following guidelines for you to consider when creating your presentation. The content is completely up to you. There is no right or wrong approach this essay. Feel free to use the software you are most comfortable with. Acceptable formats for upload in the online application system are PowerPoint or PDF. There is a strict maximum of 4 slides, though you can provide fewer than 4 if you choose. Slides will be printed and added to your file for review, therefore, flash, hyperlinks, embedded videos, music, etc. will not be viewed by the committee. You are limited to text and static images to convey your points. Color may be used. Slides will be evaluated on the quality of content and ability to convey your ideas, not on technical expertise or presentation. 4. If there is any important information that is relevant for your candidacy that you were unable to address elsewhere in the application, please share that information here.

I don't know that resumes properly demonstrate the full picture of what an Entrepreneur looks like. I believe that there should be a document summarizing the ideas that the entrepreneure really believes could happen in the proper environment. I have a list of 30 some ideas that I have put at least a month's worth of time in research, study, and analysis. I would love to reveal those, the concept, and why it hasn't happened so far. My resume is a posting of jobs that took root with evidence that they existed. There are several ideas that I ran with for months sharing the idea and putting a proposal together of what it would be. I even started a casual meeting with a friend called BYMC (Blow your Mind Club) to talk about the ideas we had for business and social improvements. Ideas range from retail concepts, real estate, web ideas, services, inventions, and how to build on franchises.

I'm like a pilot that tried to launch a plane that was bigger than my experience. I think i tried for a 747 when I should have started with gliders. The analogy continues because I have acquired a taste for big and influencial, but all my true experience can fly is a cesna. My goal is to learn to fly the 747's. I think those require a true experince and exposure. While starting a small company, I"ve been excited about working in a big one. I realized that I couldn't cross the divide with out a new set of skills and insight. I am coming back to school to regroup, spend 2 - 4 years doing my residency with Mckinsey before I return to the entreprenurial world working with a VC or launching my own plane again. I will be ceo of at least a $100 MIllion company within 10 years.

CEO and entrepreneur are synonymous. I believed in my leadership to the degree that I would rather take my low responsibility lifestyle and invest it into a business so that I could be involved in all things business: Marketing, Sales, PRoduct Design, Finaning, and strategy. After 10 years and close to $100,000 of my own funds invested - I have come to realize there is still many lessons to learn. I am like a kid in a candy store reading over your 2 year cirriculum. Brief summaries of the courses that would answer many of the questions and problems i encoutered trying to do it all myself. Those questions fall in two parts: how people get connected to other great minds, and how to learn specific skill sets. I am looking forward to comparing what I have thought about and attempted to what is being taught. My latest company was birthed out of necessity compared to intent. My mentality was to go back to the drawing board. I have learned so much from my Masters in Finance already to apply to my business....

I was involved in a car accident when I was 21. I was awarded $5,000 for my car and some damages. At the time my shirt company was still brand new. My initial thought was "there is always time to buy a car" - Let's use the money for my shirt company. So I bought a $500 nissan sentra and invested the rest into my beginning inventory. 7 tee shirt designs - aprox 100 per design.

*The main things I plan to focus on:* _Studies_ - Strategy, negotiation, supply chain, manufacturing, operations, and general management, and formalizing my Marketing education _Networking_ - Entrepreneural clubs, Consulting clubs, Venture Capital clubs, non-profit help CEO needs to know all things about all sides - finance, marketing, sales. my first 10 years of engagement were focused on sales, marketing, and finance. I want to expand my education into strategy, operations, supply chain, product development, and an offically review of my marketing theories and practices. What I bring to the table: - Excitement for adventures in capitalism - courage and risk taking - creative and colorful stories of experience What I need help with - A confirmation and correction of my perspectives - expand my knowledge - Specific new knowledge in supply chain and logistics.

I have a 50 year plan. It reaches completion when I am elected President of the united States of America in 2044. At which time i expect to have been a 2 term govenor, spent 4 - 8 years practicing law and writing laws, CEO of a Fortune 500 company, and made my money in Venture Capital. My short term steps are to complete my formal business education with an MBA fro HBS and a confirmation of this experience at Mckinsey and Company. It was a very inspiring year to get to learn about Mit Romney. I found his pathway extrememly encouraging and one I expect to emulate. I trust he will be the republican nomenie in 2012. While a small business is comfortable. My conscious will not permit me to become complacent with my own survival. I feel a strong sense of service to the greater society that has allowed me to live the life I have. I would consider my street smarts and personal study of 200+ books over the last 10 yeasr as a valuable insight to the formal learning environment.

My business could be considered brokerage. We buy pre-made tees and send them to a screen printer or sewer. I would like to take the next level of manufaturing insight in the apparel business. Knowing how build a company like sanuk the popular shoe company.

While I may be running my own business.. I woudl like it to tripple a baseball league. However, I have my sights on the majors and the only way I will get a chance is to join a successful endorsement by a top notch school. After studying about the 10th mountain division and learning that Phill Knight went to STandford, I've learned that this is the palce to be to learn the global supply chain,

To me that would be author, philosopher, and speaker. The ideas I have are questioning the status quo and the things we do.
